attributes.action: Instruct  riding schools to clean up the horse manure they create on the highway and footpaths.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every day, motorists, motor cyclists, and pedestrians face an added and unwarranted problem on the roads. We all like to see horse riding, but they should act in a public spirited manner and clean up after their horses..Farmers have to clean up after their animals !
No-one wants to be splashed by rain sodden horse manure on the roads. It`s also a problem to motor cyclists and cyclists. Who wants it on their shoes ? Not many. Some riding schools already act in a public spirited manner and have helpers walking a minute or so behind the horses, and clean up.
We need legislation to make the groups who care nothing about the mess, to have to clean up, and act in a responsible manner. Surely this would create an atmosphere of good will between themselves and the public. Please support this petition to help keep a good balance between riders "rights" and common sense. Stinking clothes and shoes are no fun.
